full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Title
Pricing Optimization Study

## Reference Number
CB-499-93624999

## Solicitation Number
23-146-RFP

## Publication Date
January 18, 2024

## Tender Closing Date
February 15, 2024 at 4:00 PM (EST)

## Amendment Number
1

## Expected Contract Start Date
February 26, 2024

## Expected Contract End Date
May 3, 2024

## Procurement Category
SRV

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal

## Regions of Opportunity
Canada

## Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity Name
Canadian Museum of Nature

## Contracting Entity Address
PO Box 3443, Station D, Ottawa, ON K1P 6P4, Canada

## Contact Information
- Name: Michelle Garber
- Email: [approvisionnement-procurement@nature.ca](mailto:approvisionnement-procurement@nature.ca)
- Phone: (613) 566-4240

## Tender Description
The Canadian Museum of Nature is seeking a qualified firm to provide pricing optimization study services in accordance with the Scope of Work (SOW). The services involve analyzing and optimizing the museum's pricing strategy to improve revenue growth and maximize returns.

## Eligibility Requirements
To be eligible, vendors must have experience in conducting market research and pricing optimization studies. Vendor registration and bid submissions are free of charge and can be completed via the Bonfire platform.

## Bid Submission Instructions
Electronic bids must be submitted via the Bonfire website at [https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca](https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca) by the deadline. Late bids will not be accepted. Vendor's relying on documents obtained from sources other than the website do so at their own risk and may result in the rejection of an individual's bid.

Note: Please verify the information on the Bonfire platform, which is the official source of information for this tender. Any questions or technical issues related to bid submissions can be directed to the contact information provided above.
